* "CIn" is also an abbreviation that is not clear from the context, so it cannot be identified as a disease.

| dimethylthiourea (DMTU) |

Here are the identified chemical entities from the given paragraph. Note that "CIn" and "GM" are also considered chemical entities as they are abbreviations for chemical compounds or substances.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

I have removed "CIn" and "GM" as they are not clearly chemical entities. The remaining entities, "Superoxide dismutase (SOD)" and "dimethylthiourea (DMTU)", are chemical compounds and are presented in the table as valid chemical entities.
